comments:
1.Create a new MRT.
2.Adds the following capabilities to that MRT.
  Identity, ManageabilityCharacteristics, MetadataExchange, Relationships, Get,
Set, Query
3. Do the codegeneration from this MRT and select the Client Proxy projectizer.
